name: BWR Public Relations
description: Headquartered in Beverly Hills and New York, B|W|R has waged innovative campaigns aimed at consumer and business audiences for more than 33 years. Our core competencies extend to lifestyle, retail and consumer brands, entertainment, corporate communications, technology and special events. Within these categories are specialties such as fashion and beauty, hospitality, product launches, film and television content, and the representation of more than 200 talent and music personalities.
